Containers.Name: chs-rtmp-server
Containers.Changes: [center][font size=4]FIRST Chesapeake RTMP Server[/font][/center] [font size=3]2020.10[/font] - Initial Release (Development)
Containers.Overview: Docker image for video streaming server that supports RTMP, HLS, and DASH streams. Designed to facilitate the streaming of remote events for FIRST Chesapeake.
Containers.Description: Docker image for video streaming server that supports RTMP, HLS, and DASH streams. Designed to facilitate the streaming of remote events for FIRST Chesapeake
